Description.Name: Why are we waiting?
Description.Details:
You arrive on the bridge and head over to talk to Darius, "Darius, remind me again, what is the status on the Console?"  

Darius quickly types some info into the computer station he is standing at, "Inventory shows we have the parts necessary to bring the Console back online, Commander.  I believe Dr Murad is just waiting on your authorisation and she estimates total costs to be under ¢2,000,000 C-Bills as well as take 14 days."

You nod, deep in thought.

After a pronounced period of silence, Darius interupts you, "Commander, do you want to have the Console repaired?"

Description.Name: Fix the Console
Description.Details:
Startled by Darius' question, you take a minute before responding, "Sorry, I was doing the budget in my head.  Have Farah and her team begin the repairs on the console."
Darius turns to the computer to type up the work order, "On to it, Commander."

Description.Name: Delay Console Repair
Description.Details:
You respond to Darius, "Thank you, Darius.  I think we best hold off some more for now until we are in a better position to warrant the repairs on the Console."

Darius nods, "As you wish, Commander."
